Name: Pop it, Please!
About the game: Relaxing game in the Pop it genre, you pop bubbles that increase in number and speed with each new level, a pleasant gaming atmosphere will create the perfect mood for the evening! Pop it, Please - A game in the Pop it genre, where the player pops bubbles and gets points that help him pass to the next level, with each new level the number of bubbles will be more and faster. Features of the game: - Relax - Visual Style - Music - Increasing Difficulty
